trigger_prototype.name: ApiServices: name:{#NAME} is not in Available State
ComponentStatuses: name:{#NAME} is not in Healthy State

item_prototype.name: Deployments: ns[{#NAMESPACE}] name[{#NAME}] NOT UP-TO-DATE replicas

trigger_prototype.name: Deployment ns:{#NAMESPACE}; name:{#NAME} is not in Available Status
Deployment ns:{#NAMESPACE}; name:{#NAME} Number of NOT up-to-date replicas gt 0

Container: node[{#NODE}] ns[{#NAMESPACE}] name[{#NAME}] containers[ {#CONTAINER}] cpu

Container: node[{#NODE}] ns[{#NAMESPACE}] name[{#NAME}] containers[ {#CONTAINER}] log fs
Container: node[{#NODE}] ns[{#NAMESPACE}] name[{#NAME}] containers[ {#CONTAINER}] mem

Pod: ns[{#NAMESPACE}] name[{#NAME}] container[{#CONTAINER}] Restart Count

trigger_prototype.name: Pod: ns:{#NAMESPACE}; name:{#NAME}; container:{#CONTAINER} is not in Ready State
